G

GameBoard - Class in cscd212classes.boards
The abstract class representing a generic game board
GameBoard(DifficultyLevel) - Constructor for class cscd212classes.boards.GameBoard
The explicit value constructor that recieves a difficulty level and creates the game board by first creating an empty arraylist, then creating the life forms by calling the appropriate subclass createLifeForms method, adjusting the difficulty level and finally trimming the enemy life forms arraylist to the proper size
GameBoardFactory - Class in cscd212classes.factories
This class builds the appropriate game board
All parameters are passed as final and all preconditions will be met
GameBoardFactory() - Constructor for class cscd212classes.factories.GameBoardFactory
 
getBoardTheme(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd212lab6.CSCD212Lab6
This method reads the board theme from the keyboard
getCurrentLifePoints() - Method in class cscd212classes.lifeform.LifeForm
Returns this LifeForm's current life points.
getCurrentLifePoints() - Method in enum class cscd212enums.LifeFormType
The getCurrentLifePoints returns the LifeFormType current life points
getDifficultyLevel(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd212lab6.CSCD212Lab6
This method reads the difficulty level from the keyboard
getEnemyLifeForms() - Method in class cscd212classes.boards.GameBoard
The getEnemyLifeForms returns the ArrayList of LifeForms that represent the enemies
getGameBoard(BoardTheme, DifficultyLevel) - Static method in class cscd212classes.factories.GameBoardFactory
This method builds the appropriate game board by checking the enumerated type and then calling the appropriate game board constructor
HINT: this is a series of ifs or if/elses what should be the default
getLifeForm(LifeFormType) - Static method in class cscd212classes.factories.LifeFormFactory
This method creates the appropriate life form by calling the other get life form method and passing it the default values for the name and the current life points
getLifeForm(LifeFormType, String, int) - Static method in class cscd212classes.factories.LifeFormFactory
This method creates the appropriate life form by calling the appropriate constructor and passing the correct parameters It checks the life form type and depending on which life form type creates a new LifeForm object.
getModifier() - Method in enum class cscd212enums.DifficultyLevel
The getModifier method returns the value of the difficulty modifier
getName() - Method in class cscd212classes.lifeform.LifeForm
Returns this LifeForm's name.
getName() - Method in enum class cscd212enums.LifeFormType
The getName returns the LifeFormType name
getPlayer() - Method in class cscd212classes.boards.GameBoard
The getPlayer method returns the current player
goAgain(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd212lab6.CSCD212Lab6
Prompts the user to play again, ensuring yes or no is entered
